title: Phase 5 Batch 5C - Predictive Analytics Revolution
description: Develop advanced predictive analytics for swarm performance optimization, trend analysis, anomaly detection, and data-driven decision making

objectives.title: Swarm Performance Prediction System
objectives.description: Implement advanced analytics for predicting swarm performance and optimization opportunities
tasks: Develop machine learning models for swarm performance prediction
success_criteria: ML models predict performance with 92% accuracy
Real-time trend analysis provides <5 second insights
Predictive bottleneck detection prevents 90% of issues
Performance forecasting covers 30-day horizons
Predictive maintenance reduces downtime by 60%

objectives.title: Advanced Anomaly Detection & Root Cause Analysis
objectives.description: Create sophisticated anomaly detection systems with automated root cause analysis
tasks: Develop anomaly prediction and prevention systems
success_criteria: Unsupervised detection identifies 95% of anomalies
Multivariate correlation provides accurate root cause in 80% of cases
Automated identification reduces analysis time by 75%
Prediction system prevents 70% of future anomalies
Impact assessment provides accurate severity scoring

objectives.title: Data-Driven Decision Framework
objectives.description: Build comprehensive framework for data-driven swarm decision making and optimization
tasks: Implement A/B testing frameworks for swarm decisions
Build confidence scoring for predictive recommendations
Develop decision impact simulation and modeling
Establish continuous learning from decision outcomes
success_criteria: Recommendation engine provides 85% accurate decisions
A/B testing validates 90% of major decisions
Confidence scoring provides reliable uncertainty metrics
Simulation modeling predicts outcomes with 80% accuracy
Continuous learning improves decision quality by 20% monthly
Predictive analytics operational with 92%+ accuracy
Anomaly detection identifies 95% of issues proactively
Data-driven decisions improve swarm performance by 40%
Predictive maintenance reduces system downtime by 60%
Root cause analysis automated for 80% of incidents
Performance forecasting provides 30-day visibility
Decision confidence scoring provides reliable uncertainty metrics
deliverables: Real-time anomaly detection and alerting system
Performance forecasting and trend analysis dashboard
A/B testing and decision validation framework

quality_gates.criteria: Predictive models validated with 92%+ accuracy on historical data
Anomaly detection tested against known issues with 95% success rate
Decision recommendations tested and validated for accuracy

risks.mitigation: Comprehensive validation and continuous model improvement
Multi-layered validation and human oversight for critical alerts
Modular design with clear fallback mechanisms

coordination_requirements.communication: Weekly progress reviews, decision framework validation

resources_required: Big data analytics platforms and tools
Machine learning and statistical analysis frameworks
Time series databases for performance data
notes: Revolutionary predictive analytics for swarm optimization. Foundation for data-driven swarm intelligence.
